website_summaries.verdict: The stainless steel and leather of this flask give it a sturdy feel. It also garners high praise for its looks.
pros: Sturdy stainless steel construction with leather for improved grip
Comes in a variety of colors, as well as a 6-ounce version
cons: Flask has a bad odor right out of the packaging
Will discolor contents of the flask if you leave it too long
Some buyers report problems with leaks, as well as missing funnels

customer_reviews.title: Classy, expensive looking and feeling flask for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these as groomsmen gifts for our wedding day! When we got them in the mail, we immediately noticed that they were made with superior quality and looked way more expensive than how much they actually cost! They were perfect for wedding "getting ready" photos and video, and the guys seemed to really put them to use during our wedding day, and had way more fun than without them! If you need a super classy looking flask, or unsure of what to give someone as a gift who loves a little liquid courage on the go, this is definitely a great gift option, or for yourself! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne O.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what more I could want out of a flask without there being too much.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with it's simple style, comfortable to hold, the cap has nice grip as well as screws on and off very smoothly. I've also never been a fan of caps that dangle on the side. I'd rather just take the cap completely off than have it in the way when I want to take a drink. I did worry that the leather would just be a loose sleeve but it's (I'm assuming glued) on very well secured. Going back to my headline, when I say there would bee too much if there was more, I just don't see the need to have a collapsible shot glass or other gimmick added to a flask.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Half a Product for full Price
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT come with the funnel. It was missing. And I refuse to wait an entire other week for a replacement while having to send back the one I have. I want to use it NOW. I just want the FUNNEL, not a full replacement- why should I have to send it back? Just to get it back with the funnel? I'm pissed I waited as long as I did and wasted money on half a product. I want an option to get the funnel delivered on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Scar Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've had this flask for a fee weeks now and couldn't be more happy with it. The leather looks great and is holding up well. No leaks on the flask itself. The rubber ring around the cap is great and I like that the cap comes off entirely. I would purchase this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: Easily the highest quality flask I've ever owned. Got the brown leather bound one, and had previously bought a regular stainless steel flask for my birthday. You can really appreciate the weight and sturdiness of this guy.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wegner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a good quality flask. I bought this for the durability and how it was made...the inside is the most important for me in terms of keeping my beverage cool and no flaking or rust.
customer_reviews.author: Nitro

customer_reviews.title: Great flask for the Golf Course
customer_reviews.text: Really like that it has greater capacity than most flasks we have tried. Also like fact that cap is easy to use. Leather casing looks great and gives this flask a classy look.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice flask at a very good price. The size is perfect. The company reaches out to its customers, making it obvious that my satisfaction is important. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TNMan38

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, no issues with it so far. It holds liquor and looks good, what more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift, my friend loves it and brings it backpacking/hiking every time. Looks great and the funnel it comes with makes a big difference in filling it up
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great flask!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves this flask! He loves the black and brown leather cover. Also, he says it's the perfect fit inside your jacket.
customer_reviews.author: GERAX

customer_reviews.title: Nice flask
customer_reviews.text: Nice flask. Gave it to my brother for his 50th bday.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dragon Con😊
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for a long weekend at Dragon Con, and are very happy with them! Carried them for hours in a messenger bag, no leaks!! Yes, there was an odd smell when brand new, but we rinsed them out with 1 drop of dish detergent, and that was all that was needed. No funny taste in our whiskey or hippy juice cocktails. These would make great Christmas gifts for your con buddies!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I picked this flask up for a Friends 75th Birthday and it is Beautiful and very well made. I'm sure he will be most pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Flask
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality Flask, I use it to carry water with me. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Voges

customer_reviews.title: Classy flask
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something subtle and classy and this fits the bill. Every time I use it someone always complements the flask.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice flask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved it! He especially like that it came with a funnel. It's a quality product. And serves it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: melinda wright

customer_reviews.title: Great classic look
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for gifts and both gents loved them! Really classy looking for a very affordable price. I didn’t actually try the flask so can’t speak to its usability but it sure looked good and appears to be an excellent flask!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the scotch drinker
customer_reviews.text: Great, attractive flask perfect for gifting. Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift, you need to be careful handling as the pleather will scratch easily; other than that it’s a very nice looking flask and it does not spill at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I said “ I do”!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to pour shots to my groomsmen on my wedding. Helped me with my nerves before the ceremony. Good quality and it was the reason I said I Do! Guys, take a shot of of good ol Kentucky Reserve from this flask!
customer_reviews.author: I.R SF

customer_reviews.title: Just As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend for their 21st Birthday and they LOVED it. They use it, well...all the time lol. Came in a nice gift box! Leather was kind of thin on it but that's expected for the price. All in all it looked great regardless!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great for the price. Does not leak. I primarily use it on the golf course which is thrown around a lot. I have had no issues with it. It’s looks nice and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cucci

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant/gentlemanish deaign. Great for flasking in style, really good qualloty too, my 4th flask this being the best

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, reliable Flask.
customer_reviews.text: PM the sturdy, well made flask. Leather cover very nice. Use for liquor.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but doesn't keep drinks cool
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty good flask for the price. The leather around the outside is a nice touch too. Only complaint is that it doesn't keep things cool that long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great on cold days
customer_reviews.text: leather covering saves your hands on cold days...provides a better grip when it gets wet outside

customer_reviews.title: Loose cup
customer_reviews.text: The only one thing that catches my eye is loose cup. You need to pay attention on it and it takes space in hand ;)
customer_reviews.author: Maksym Dmytrov

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it but the very first thing he noticed was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a gift. He really liked it but the very first thing he noticed was there was no chain to connect the top to the flask. I never thought that would be important but evidently for a 21 year old it is. He still liked it and I'm sure will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny T.

customer_reviews.title: Good as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown and black flask a few months ago and got this as a gift for my boyfriend for his 21st birthday and it’s awesome. He loves it. If you’re going for a gift or just something for yourself, I’d highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using this product on a recent trip to NYC. It helps to bring a nice warm elixer to help ward off the cold biting wind as you're walking through the streets of the city. This flask was comfortable to carry, hold and use. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect for those golf days when the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect for those golf days when the round isn't going as well as I would like.. :-)

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my friend for his 21st birthday. He has used it several times since! Great gift.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful flask alright, well packaged, arrived quickly... I'd call it the perfect well

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year and still has that same new flask smell
customer_reviews.text: Ive had mine for almost a year now. It looks great and is sturdy but the smell it had when new still hasnt gone away. It doesnt really affect the taste, but you cant really enjoy the smell of what youre drinking.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality

customer_reviews.title: I have received many compliments on this flask and carry it with great pride!

It comes in a gift box with sturdy Styrofoam packaging inside so your flask and funnel fit in nicely. Even though this is a gift for someone else, I'm jealous that he's getting it. Would order another one for myself but overseas shipping is pricey.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that it fills very slowly when using the ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is that it fills very slowly when using the funnel. An o-ring around the funnel to flask neck may help or something that allows air to escape when filling. Otherwise elegant looking. A keeper.

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great feel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and recipient was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Sue E.

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it! The leather and the stitching was beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He really liked it! The leather and the stitching was beautiful with no flaws. I love that the product came in two boxes, one with the flask then a second to protect the first box. The first box is great for displaying until the flask is needed. I also love that it came with a funnel, which other options didn't and cost way more than this one. The flask is sturdy and doesn't seem as if it will bend or dent easy. This turned out to be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: O.A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved getting this for his birthday. The quality is good and the funnel is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Houtman

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and makes an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.text: I carry this in my golf bag, for obvious reasons. Quality materials and makes an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Fallon

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this product. It is attractive and will serve my purposes well. It is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DHC

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great so far. I have used it on 4 separate occasions (weddings, graduations, etc) & each time worked like a champ. No leakage. Do follow the care instructions. IE don't leave alcohol in it overnight. I have cleaned it with warm soapy water after each use (drying the outside leather ASAP if any water gets on it), and so far no metallic taste.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it was what I was looking for as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his gift and I am very pleased as weel
customer_reviews.author: Babebola

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for a good friend. I liked the look of the flask, and the fact that is covered in leather. When I received the flask, I looked at it to see if it met my expectations. It is wonderful. The leather and the stitching is perfect. Classy. I hope our friend enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: roseaubrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flask, but didnt receive funnel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the flask as a gift and the condition of the flask itself was excellent, however, I didn't receive the funnel that was supposed to be included in the package. Since it was a gift, the recipient of the gift insisted on not returning it to receive the accessory that was supposed to be included. Although this is a minor inconvenience, I'm still disappointed that it wasn't included. Besides that, the recipient was very satisfied with the condition of the flask.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Wolpe

customer_reviews.title: Happy Days with a flask!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this flask. It's stylish, functional, and fits into my pocket easily.
customer_reviews.author: Be Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, looks great. It was a gift for my husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather wrap, quality metal and extra funnel for filling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flask!
customer_reviews.text: So I have recently quit drinking beer but have switched to solely drinking whiskey, and with the price of a nice whiskey in NYC a flask is a must. This is a great one! It is sturdy and comes with a funnel which is nice. When I initially unpackaged it, there was a very chemical smell from the adhesive used to put the leather on the flask, however after a couple uses the smell goes away. I appreciate that the metal used is restaurant quality steel, so it should last longer... All in all I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BTGS

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made. Time will tell for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. Time will tell for sure. Got this to replace a flask I used for probably 15 years or more and that finally gave up to age. This one is nice. I like the leather wrap. The funnel is a nice bonus. Love the metal cap, so many I've looked at have plastic caps. Comes in a nice box that's perfect for gifting or storage when not in use. I hope to have this flask for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband last Christmas and he was blown away by the quality of the leather and the look of it. The box it came in was very nice and perfect for gifting it in. It does hold a lot in it and it is very large. Probably too large to fit in most pockets, at least on slim-fit pants, unless they're very deep/big. But a jacket pocket might work, or a bag. Good quality product, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive flask.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. It looks attractive and expensive. The leather feels quality and the actual stainless steel flask feels sturdy and substantial. Tested with some bourbon and the flask didn't leak after being held upsidedown for a few minutes. The stainless steel didn't seem to alter the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Looks so nice!
customer_reviews.text: This flask was purchased for my husband. He is very pleased with it. Not only does it look nice, but it is a good solid product and the lid does not have that hinge that never seems to line up with the cap. All in all, it is a very good product and great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: Flask is sturdy and well designed. Comes with handy funnel. Beautiful finish with the leather covering over flask. Made a wonderful gift and really was a big hit with recipient. Everyone always asks where he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.. well made, does not leak... but was misisng the Funnel on the 2nd one I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.. order two of them. the 2nd one was missing the little funnel but I only put water in it. No worries but they should have checked it. Does not leak and the covering keeps it from slipping form one's hands.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur W. Henrick

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking flask. Comes in a very nice gift box with foam cutout insert to hold and present the flask and funnel. The giftee was very happy

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED WITH FAST DELIVERY 100% SATISFIED
